title: Bug 19089 - No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
description: When using the Photon version of the Java editor, the popup menu in the left vertical ruler does not appear when right-clicked.
OB:
1) Open a Java editor.
2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler.
Expected: A menu should appear to add breakpoints/marks, etc.
Actual: The menu does not appear.
EB:
1) Open a Java editor.
2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler.
Expected: A menu should appear to add breakpoints/marks, etc.
Actual: The menu does not appear.
SR:
1) Open a Java editor.
2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler.
3) Verify that a menu does not appear.
